Table: article

Articles are publications in peer reviewed journals, and generally have DOIs.

article Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
identifier character varying PRIMARY KEY

The identifier : this should be the DOI, if there is one.
title character varying

The title of the article (source: crossref.org).
doi character varying UNIQUE

The digital object identifier for the article.
year integer

The year of publication.
journal.identifier journal_identifier character varying NOT NULL

The GCIS identifier for the journal.
journal_vol character varying

The volume of the journal in which the article appears (source: crossref.org)
journal_pages character varying

The pages of the journal on which the article appears (source: crossref.org)
url character varying

A URL for the article (not necessary if there is a DOI).
notes character varying

Notes about this entry.
description character varying

The abstract of the article, or a similar brief description.

 

article Constraints
Name Constraint
article_doi_check CHECK (((doi)::text ~ '^10.[[:print:]]+/[[:print:]]+$'::text))
article_identifier_check CHECK ((((identifier)::text ~ similar_escape('[a-z0-9_-]+'::text, NULL::text)) OR ((identifier)::text ~ '^10.[[:print:]]+/[[:print:]]+$'::text)))
